sentence: Nice enough stay but given that we paid over £ 680 1050 for 5 days stay it did nt really match the pricing
well furnished bedrooms free WiFi the only problem was bad signal by the swimming pool area will recommended family or friends to pay a visit to this beautiful place
LOLIf you want nice Kauai experience but do not want the prices of the resorts this is the way to goI would stay here again
Prices are great for Hawaii but this is a cat 7 on Mariot Reward points up from 5 from 2 years ago
They charge you 40 extra a night upon check in and try to make you feel better buy giving you two yoga classes and two free Mia Tias
Great Location and Price Point in Kuaui
this is a good location and good value for Kauai and HI in general which everyone knows to be very expensive
Great hotel very affordable rates with a great environment
Location rate and amenities A combination of cozy beachfront and convenience near restaurants and shops Provide the actual amount of the resort fee
Great price for a relaxing place
I felt the prices were not any higher than surrounding restaurants and actually had much better food
We called the last day just to see especially because they were expensive but were told nothing showed up
Important to know that this is not really a resort and I decided to think of the “ resort ” fee as a parking charge
IT DOES affect paying guests
pretty expensive for the look of the place
pool was to cold for adults my party limited pool umbrellas and lounge chairs can not swim from beach frozen drinks are a little pricey
I feel even more upset knowing I paid more than another place we were considering because we wanted a slightly nicer hotel

Worst hotel ever Apparently they were undergoing renovations No pool no proper bar Hallways were closed off via dry wall and paper signs were hanging to give directions We were never contacted about our hotel to make us aware but were told instead of using there beach front pool that we paid for we could go to the Neigbour hood hotel pool Front staff seemed overwhelmed My wife tripped and fell on there makeshift walk ramp no manager came just for t staff to say that ’s never happens before
Pay to park in the construction zone no access to beach
I even found out two days later they charged us for not showing up
